channel.title: Two questions
channel.description:
Hey guys I need help with two things, 1. I'm guessing this object is client side but how do I remove it? [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/1zxv1ci.jpg[/img]
2. Just like how my PK teleport is, I want to change the Falador teleport to 'places' and have Ardy, Lumberbridge and Falador in them, how do I make it look like this though?
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/r90gat.jpg[/img]
Thanks guys!

item.title: Two questions
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

Thanks, for your help but I can’t find them in the files.

Read full topic

item.title: Two questions
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

Question 1 is in ObjectManager, sadly I cant tell you the method
Question 2 is in DialogueHandler, ActionHandler and ClickingButtons

I’m on my iPod so I cant tell you the codes. But this is a step in the right direction

There is many tutorials on both these question.
I suggest looking at the Basic PI tutorials thread in the tutorials section

Read full topic
